title: Is Vladimir Putin hard to kill or unkillable? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let's not go there. Putin shall be the Designated Mediator as *ONE WORLD ORDER* is smoothly and methodically ushered in. All 7.5 billion citizens will be acknowledged as *Sovereign and Independent Souls* The Elite 1%…the Illuminati…will not be in power as originally envisioned. Stay Tuned….A New Geopolitical Philosophy Is Emerging. A Hyperconscious Society Is Evolving. The World Is Becoming A Much Better Place!
